$comment: Discord control-plane runtime visibility schema. This schema defines an optional, read-only status snapshot that may be exposed by the Discord runtime for dashboard consumption. The runtime remains authoritative; absence of this data must never be treated as an error.
title: Discord Control-Plane Runtime Status
description: Optional, non-authoritative status metadata emitted by the Discord control-plane runtime when deployed. This schema is used for read-only dashboard visibility and inspection only.

runtime_role.description: Indicates that this runtime operates as a control-plane rather than a streaming data-plane.

enabled.description: Whether the Discord control-plane runtime is enabled for this deployment.

connection_state.description: Best-effort connection state of the Discord client when visible.

heartbeat.description: Timestamp of the most recent heartbeat tick emitted by the Discord runtime (UTC, ISO 8601).

started_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the Discord runtime was started (UTC, ISO 8601).

guild_count.description: Number of Discord guilds the bot is currently connected to, if available.

presence.description: Current visible Discord presence, if exposed by the runtime.

status_text.description: Custom status text currently applied to the bot.

status_emoji.description: Unicode emoji associated with the current status, if any.
